item.name: Sue
item.description: Mr. Pollen's family hails from the European continent, and his laid back personality makes him fun to unwind with.

item.name: Strawberry Beauty
item.description: This Southern belle is as smart as she is beautiful. She'll keep you guessing with her inquisitive nature and expansive trivia knowledge.

item.name: Sean
item.description: This Egnlish gentleman is a fine gem for anyone who enjoys afternoon tea and discussing Medeival politics.

item.name: Dusty Legs
item.description: Ol' Dusty Legs does best as the only bee in the friend group. He can get a little nervous and likes people who will take time to listen to his life's stories
